scripts.run:redis: yarn destroy:redis && docker run --name product-api-redis -p 6379:6379 -d redis
scripts.run:mssql: yarn destroy:mssql && docker build -t dbrcawebaccounts ./docker/db/ && docker run --name product-api-sql -p 1433:1433 -d dbrcawebaccounts
scripts.destroy:mssql: docker stop product-api-sql && docker rm product-api-sql || exit 0
scripts.destroy:redis: docker stop product-api-redis && docker rm product-api-redis || exit 0
scripts.run:elasticsearch: yarn destroy:elasticsearch && docker run -d -p 9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 --name product-api-elasticsearch -e "discovery.type=single-node" elasticsearch:7.9.3
scripts.destroy:elasticsearch: docker stop product-api-elasticsearch && docker rm product-api-elasticsearch || exit 0
